findings.liver: The hepatic parenchyma appears coarsened. The contour of the liver is smooth. There is no focal liver mass. The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow.
findings.bile_ducts: There is no intrahepatic biliary dilation.
findings.gallbladder: There are several stones and layering sludge in a minimally distended gallbladder. There is a small amount of pericholecystic fluid without significant wall edema.
findings.pancreas: The pancreas is not well visualized, largely obscured by overlying bowel gas.
findings.retroperitoneum: The aorta and IVC were not visualized due to technical limitations.
